hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Do you find me seeing towards the Qibla only? By Allah, your bowing and your prostrating are not hidden from my view. Verily I see them behind my back

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَمْرِ بِتَحْسِينِ الصَّلاَةِ وَإِتْمَامِهَا وَالْخُشُوعِ فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Command To Perform The Prayer Properly, To Complete It, And To Have Khushu' In It
